type.name: org.gradle.plugins.ide.idea.GenerateIdeaWorkspace
type.description: Generates an IDEA workspace file *only* for root project. There's little you can configure about workspace generation at the moment.

method.name: getWorkspace
method.description: The Idea workspace model containing the details required to generate the workspace file.

property.name: workspace
property.description: The Idea workspace model containing the details required to generate the workspace file.
